code_info: Lot #1328702013 All cases stamped with Lot #1328702013 and also showing a USE BY date of JUL/14/14 along with a 24-hour time stamp between 15:00 and 24:00. For example, a case showing "1328702013 17:36 USE BY JUL/14/14" is subject to the recall while "1328702013 02:14 USE BY JUL/14/14" is not subject to the recall.  Also NOT included in the recall would be a case showing an earlier USE BY date along with Lot # 1328702013. For example, "1328702013 15:36 USE BY JUL/13/14" is not subject to the recall.
